Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Morgan Freeman narrated the viral video, when in fact it was an impersonator named Charlie Hopkinson.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that Morgan Freeman narrated the video.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the viral video was narrated by Morgan Freeman based on the similarity of the narrator's voice, without verifying the information.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the possibility that the video was a parody or impersonation, instead assuming that it was narrated by Morgan Freeman.
